About Me

BIO

I am a graduate in the University of Technology Sydney, I am majoring in Information Technology with Enterprise System Development which includes software development, Web development, etc. I am interested in the Web Development field and am seeking an Entry-Level roleÂ or internship in web developer position.

Being an international student, I have repeatedly been exposed to new cultures and diverse groups of people in college. This has made me able to quickly integrate into the collective. I am alway enjoying in learning new things. I like to fix errors and solve problems. I am detail-oriented person and deal well along with the colleagues.

I believe that the skills I have attained from the competitive university life define me, and I am looking forward to implementing and polishing them in any opportunity that I receive.
